name: Gun Boar
description:
It's a 2d top-down shooter/puzzle where the player needs to complete an objective either stealthily or head on.

This game is about a mercenary, who has been tasked to complete a mission, the missions can be stealing or killing a target. 

A top-down shooter where you can fight waves of enemies on some levels and other levels with a finite amount. 4 types of enemies and 8 types of weapons.
